content:
👋 Hello world!
I’m currently pursuing MSc in Computer Vision at University College London (UCL). Previously, I led machine learning at NFTPort from its inception through its Series A of $26M. Prior to that, I worked with Dr Brandie Nonnecke at the intersection of machine learning and social network analysis as a visiting student at University of California, Berkeley. I have also spent time as a research intern at Nvidia and IIT Kharagpur.
Will we ever answer The Last Question? Perhaps not, but it’s definitely worth pursuing :)
“Break the cycle, Morty. Rise above. Focus on Science.”

title: Niladri Shekhar Dutt 👾
